text: Akar Godɨn Akɨnafarimɨn itim kamaghɨn mɨgei, ‘Gumazir nɨghnɨzir gavgavim nan itim, a dɨpar ikɨrɨmɨrir zurara itim anɨdim, an navir averiam gizɨvaghɨva, egh fasfagh iram.’”(7:38) Godɨn Akɨnafarimɨn aven, akar otevir mam, akar Iesus vezɨn kamɨn mɨkemezɨ moghɨn, akar kam ko, aning magh ghuzir puvatɨ. Nɨ Aisaia 44:3 ko Sindaun 18:4ɨn gan.
